General.Name: AutoStore Holdings Ltd
General.Description: AutoStore Holdings Ltd., a robotic and software technology company, provides warehouse automation solutions in Norway, rest of Nordics, Germany, rest of Europe, the United States, Asia, and internationally. It offers grids, ports, bins, robots, workstations, controllers, and spare parts. The company also provides Qublt Fulfillment Platform, a warehouse management software; PickUpPort, a public-facing port that enables contactless in-store pickup; R5+, a robot based on the technology product; ASIO 3.0, a safety component; Bin Lift 2.0, a redesigned vertical lift for bins; and Unify Analytics, a cloud-based service and data platform that simplifies the aggregation and presentation of metrics. It serves retail, grocery, third party logistic, industrial, and healthcare industries. The company was formerly known as AutoStore NewCo Ltd. and changed its name to AutoStore Holdings Ltd. in October 2021. AutoStore Holdings Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Nedre Vats, Norway.
